feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-22T18:00:22.035912Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;我死于鳞状细胞癌，潜在的治疗方法遥不可及</stitle>; <id>;https://jakeseliger.com/2023/07/22/i-am-dying-of-squamous-cell -carcinoma-and-the-treatments-that-might-save-me-are-just-out-of-reach/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T16:59:53.918132Z</updated>; <link href="https://jakeseliger.com/2023/07/22/i-am-dying-of-squamous-cell-carcinoma-and-the-treatments-that -might-save-me-are-just-out-of-reach/"/>; <author>; <name>;theoldlove</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=theoldlove</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://jseliger.files.wordpress.com/2023/07/dsf4195.jpg?w=1024" style="width: 220px ; height: 147px;" />;<br />;Alex Tabarrok 撰写了有关 FDA 救生药物审批过程缓慢的文章，这可能会导致不必要的死亡。作者患有鳞状细胞癌，他强调了 mRNA 肿瘤疫苗在治疗他的病情方面的潜力。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#i-am-dying-of-squamous-cell-carcinoma-and-潜在-治疗-are-out-of- reach" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36827438" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;计算机简史</stitle>; <id>;https://www.lesswrong.com/posts /vfRpzyGsikujm9ujj/a-brief-history-of-computers</id>; <更新>;2023-07-22T13:59:53.919192Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.lesswrong.com/posts/vfRpzyGsikujm9ujj/a-brief-history-of-computers"/>; <作者>; <名称>;zdw </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zdw</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://39669.cdn.cke-cs.com/rQvD3VnunXZu34m86e5f/images/c57999325bc3b993c35e30d580fedceaede559951af1 56e1.png" style="宽度: 220px; height: 74px;" />;<br />;计算机的历史可以追溯到亚里士多德在逻辑方面的开创性工作。乔治·布尔在 1800 年代中期进一步发展了布尔逻辑。提花织机是一种使用打孔卡的织布机，启发查尔斯·巴贝奇创建了差分机，一种用于计算数学表格的机器。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-brief-history-of-computers" target=" _blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36826210" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;消费者软件预计将成为下一个快速增长的细分市场 (1994)</stitle>; <id>;https:// www.csmonitor.com/1994/0513/13082.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-22T14:59:53.920053Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.csmonitor.com/1994/0513/13082.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;1970-01-01</名称>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=1970-01-01</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images.csmonitor.com/csm/2019/11/1025853_6_Mark-Sappenfield-drawing_standard.png?alias=square_400x400" style="width: 220px; height: 221px;" />;<br />;消费类软件预计将在未来几年成为该行业增长最快的部分。软件行业的主要参与者正在将其前景扩展到家庭市场，因为现在有近三分之一的美国家庭拥有电脑。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#consumer-software-is-expected-to-be-next-fast-forming-segment-1994" target="_blank ">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36813688" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;拥抱复杂性；收紧反馈循环</stitle>; <id>;https://ferd.ca/embrace-complexity -tighten-your-feedback-loops.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T11:59:53.920901Z</updated>; <link href="https://ferd.ca/embrace-complexity-tighten-your-feedback-loops.html"/>; <author>; <name>;lutzh</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lutzh</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://ferd.ca/static/img/qcon-ny2023/01.png" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;在本文中，作者讨论了在处理生活和系统时拥抱复杂性和收紧反馈循环的重要性。他们认为系统总是会面临将其推向混乱边缘的挑战和压力，而试图控制和消除复杂性可能会产生更多问题。相反，作者建议在引导事物方面发挥有限的影响力，以尽可能长时间地延迟混乱。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#embrace-complexity-tight en-your-feedback-loops" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36825345" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;MSX-DOS</stitle>; <id>;https://en.wiki pedia.org/wiki/MSX-DOS</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T08:59:53.924005Z</updated>; <link href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MSX-DOS"/>; <author>; <name>;pavlov</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pavlov</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;MSX-DOS 是Microsoft 为 8 位家用计算机标准 MSX 开发的已停产磁盘操作系统。它是 MS-DOS v1.25 和 CP/M-80 v2.2 之间的交叉版本。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#msx-dos" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36797650" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;超过你曾经想了解 Rust 中的错误</stitle>; <id>;https://www.shuttle.rs/blog/2022/06/30/error-handling</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T13:59:53.924851Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.shuttle.rs/blog/2022/06/30/error-handling"/>; <author>; <name>;asymmetry</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=asynchronous</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.shuttle.rs/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fblog%2Fferris-error-handling.png&w=1920&q=75" style="宽度：220px；高度：116px；" />;<br />;错误是软件中不可避免的事实。本文讨论如何处理 Rust 中的错误，包括不可恢复的错误（恐慌）和使用 Result 类型的可恢复错误。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#more-than-you-ve-ever-wanted-to-know-about-errors-in-rust" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36825992" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hack ernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;肉毒杆菌毒素：生物武器和神奇药物（2010）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3028942/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T13:59:53.925606Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.nc bi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3028942/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;redbell</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=redbell</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3028942/bin/IJMR-132-48 9-g001.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：153px；" />;<br />;肉毒梭菌产生的肉毒杆菌神经毒素非常有效，可以用作生物武器。然而，它们也被开发成治疗人类疾病的治疗药物。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#botulinum-toxin-bioweapon-and-magic-drug-2010" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36826177" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernew s.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;苹果的交互式电视盒：破解 ROM 中的机顶盒 System 7.1</stitle>; <id>;http://oldvcr.blogspot.com/2023/07/apples-interactive-television-box.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T05:59:53.926344Z</updated>; <link href="http://old vcr.blogspot.com/2023/07/apples-interactive-television-box.html"/>; <author>; <name>;todsacerdoti</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEg T5ldv1fTGlQrFwP9YveESyKNAoqxHlTII0uFm4NYQRJ8gvKaGvGh0Y-2mgZNL9w-TNhZFhb77W_OvZDlmPvrRHmvLf4xlIUXLH7BbsJuOEtCPRKP3-6T3W6rUgrGEo7FDsFNujaetgxrK0BHIovLKHT wsW6njPPheMKDQFNUAv33t3jrMOxvq3HO8Ez8U/s320/PXL_20230709_004451960.jpg" style="宽度：220px; height: 166px;" />;<br />;Apple 交互式电视盒 (AITB) 是 Apple 在 20 世纪 90 年代开发的一款机顶盒。它设计为在 T1/E1 线路或 CD 上运行，基于 Quadra 605 硬件。但是，AITB 从未推出零售，大多数设备都被召回和销毁。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#apple-s-interactive-television- box-hacking-the-set-top-box-system-7-1-in-rom" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36823565" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;放置CPU中的“你”</stitle>; <id>;https://cpu.land/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T05:59:53.927862Z</updated>; <link href="https://cpu.land/"/>; <author>; <name>;uneekname</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=uneekname</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://cpu.land/orpheus-flag.svg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;作者对程序在计算机上运行时发生的情况的了解存在差距。他们进行了研究，现在对计算机从启动到程序执行的工作方式有了更好的了解。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#putting-the-you-in-cpu" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=3682 3605" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Octos – HTML动态壁纸引擎</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/underpig1/octos</id>; <更新>;2023-07-22T08:59:53.928655Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/underpig1/octos"/>; <author>; <name>;underpig1</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=underpig1</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/underpig1/octos/master/img/tray.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;在 Windows 上使用 HTML、CSS 和 JS 创建、分发和探索实时交互式壁纸。Octos 目前处于开发的早期阶段。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#octos-html-live-wallpaper-engine" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=3682459 5" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;图表中的 AWS 网络概念</stitle>; <id>;https://miparnisariblog.wordpress.com/2023/03/29/aws-networking-concepts/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T05:5 9:53.930429Z</updated>; <link href="https://miparnisariblog.wordpress.com/2023/03/29/aws-networking-concepts/"/>; <作者>; <name>;mparnisari</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mparnisari</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://miparnisariblog.files。 wordpress.com/2023/03/image.png?w=1024" style="width: 220px; height: 201px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了作者为理解 AWS VPC 仪表板所做的努力以及他们为了解网络资源所做的努力。他们发现 AWS 中可能存在多种类型的连接。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#aws-networking-concepts-in-a-diagram" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id =36823516" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;为什么还要让用户设置自己的密码？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.devever.net/~hl/passwords</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T13:59:53.93 1220Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.devever.net/~hl/passwords"/>; <author>; <name>;hlandau</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=hlandau</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;本文讨论了当前的趋势，即不再将密码作为访问的充分条件。相反，正在转向强制 2FA 或基于风险的身份验证。如果用户在登录时总是需要执行额外的身份验证步骤，那么作者质疑密码的用途。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-even-let-users-set-their-own-passwords" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36826111" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Plane – 开源 Jira 替代方案</stitle>; <id>;https://plane.so</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T08:59:53.931992Z</updated>; <link href="https://plane.so"/>; <author>; <name>;prhrb</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=prhrb</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://plane-marketing.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/plane-assets/icons/youtube.svg" style="width: 220px; height: 162px;" />;<br />;开源项目管理工具，可安心管理问题、冲刺和产品路线图。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#plane-open-source-jira-alternative" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36824450" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;Google 尝试为部分员工电脑提供互联网隔离</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theregister.com/2023/07/19/google_cuts_internet/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T06:59:53.932792Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.theregister.com/2023/07/19/google_cuts_internet/" />; <author>; <name>;beardyw</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=beardyw</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://regmedia.co.uk/2020/03/25/shutterstock_severed_cable.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 144px;" />;<br />;Google 正在进行一项实验，切断部分员工工作站的互联网连接，以增强安全性。该试验仅限于不到百分之二的工作站，参与者的一般互联网访问权限将被取消。然而，通过网络访问谷歌的工具和办公软件仍然可以被那些与互联网隔绝的人使用。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#google-tries-internet-air-gap-for-some-staff-pcs" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36797471" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;神经技术：当前发展和道德问题</stitle>; <id>;https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fnsys.2017.00093/full</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T11:59:53.933567Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.frontiersin .org/articles/10.3389/fnsys.2017.00093/full"/>; <author>; <name>;Quinzel</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Quinzel</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;神经技术是一个旨在将人脑与机器直接连接的领域。它涉及使用电极、计算机和假肢来记录和操纵大脑活动。这项技术具有潜在的临床应用并引发了伦理问题。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#neurotechnology-current-developments-and-ethical-issues" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36825481" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;为什么这些藻类在池子里长成这样？</stitle>; <id>;https://physicals.stackexchange.com/questions/772882/why-did-these-algae-grow-like-this-in-the-pool-are-these-curves-the-gravitation</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T11:59:53.934343 Z</updated>; <link href="https://physicals.stackexchange.com/questions/772882/why-did-these-algae-grow-like-this-in-the-pool-are-these-curves-the-gravitation"/>; <author>; <name>;pyinstallwoes</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pyinstallwoes</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<im g src="https://i.stack.imgur.com/D1HNQ.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：294px；" />;<br />;我的朋友给我发了这些已经废弃很长时间的水池的照片，我们很好奇这种图案中藻类的奇特生长背后的原因。藻类的针状塔似乎类似于数学方程 z = 1/(x^2 + y^2)。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-did-these-algae-grow-like-this-in-the-pool" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36825119" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hacker news.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;当我们谈论系统设计时我们在谈论什么</stitle>; <id>;https://maheshba.bitbucket.io/blog/2023/07/12/Design.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T04:59:53.935097Z</updated>; <link href="https://maheshba.bitbucket.io/blog/ 2023/07/12/Design.html"/>; <author>; <name>;scv119</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=scv119</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;用抽象对抗复杂性的设计过程对于解决现实世界的问题是有效的。设计的后期绑定、讨论设计空间以及并行设计和开发过程是需要遵循的关键规则。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#what-we-talk-about-when-we-talk-about-system-design" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36823375" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;ElKaWe – 电热热泵</stitle>; <id>;https://www.fraunhofer.de/en/research/lighthouse-projects-fraunhofer-initiatives/fraunhofer-lighthouse-projects/elkawe.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T05:59:53.935893Z</updated>; <link href="https://www. fraunhofer.de/en/research/lighthouse-projects-fraunhofer-initiatives/fraunhofer-lighthouse-projects/elkawe.html"/>; <author>; <name>;danans</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=danans</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.fraunhofer.de/en/research/lighthouse-projects-fraunhof er-initiatives/fraunhofer-lighthouse-projects/elkawe/jcr:content/stage/stageParsys/stage_slide/image.img.jpg/1574244502657/ElKaWe-KV-web.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 84px;" />;<br />;ElKaWe 灯塔项目旨在开发比传统压缩机热泵更高效、更环保的电热热泵。科学家们正在研究陶瓷和聚合物基电热材料以及高效散热的创新系统方法。该项目旨在展示电热热泵长期替代压缩机的潜力。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#elkawe-electriccaloric-heat-pump s" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36823524" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;使用 PyTorch 的计算化学</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/Mar iewelt/OpenChem</id>; <更新>;2023-07-22T11:59:53.936661Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/Mariewelt/OpenChem"/>; <作者>; <name>;gtsnexp</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gtsnexp</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// raw.githubusercontent.com/Mariewelt/OpenChem/master/docs/logo.png" style="width: 220px; height: 101px;" />;<br />;OpenChem 是一个使用 PyTorch 后端的计算化学深度学习工具包。OpenChem 的目标是使深度学习模型成为计算化学和药物设计研究人员易于使用的工具。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#computational-chemistry-using-pytorch" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;互联网搜索提示</stitle>; <id>;https://gwern.net/search</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T03:59:53.937441Z</updated>; <link href="https://gwern.net/search"/>; height: 145px;" />;<br />;随着时间的推移，我在网上查找参考资料、论文和书籍方面积累了一定的 google 能力和专业知识。其中一些技巧并不为人所知，例如检查互联网档案馆 (IA) 中的书籍。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#internet-search-tips" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <id>;https://biofabrik.com/biotumen/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T07:59:53.9397 26Z</updated>; <link href="https://biofabrik.com/biotumen/"/>; <作者>; <name>;patall</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=patall</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://biofabrik.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/Biofabrik-Headquarter-711x400.png" style="width ：220像素； height: 124px;" />;<br />;文章讨论了环保领域初创公司数量的不断增加，并宣布与 BAYERNOIL Raffineriegesellschaft mbH 达成商业协议。文中还提到了澳大利亚第一座 WASTX 塑料系列工厂的投产。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#biotumen-bitumen-reinvented" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36824330" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;辛普森·范种植托马科 (2003)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.simpsonsarchive.com/news/tomacco.html</ id>; <更新>;2023-07-22T09:59:53.940562Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.simpsonsarchive.com/news/tomacco.html"/>; <作者>; <name>;pipeline_peak</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pipeline_peak</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www .simpsonsarchive.com/news/tomacco1.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 166px;" />;<br />;奥斯威戈湖的辛普森粉丝成功培育出带有烟草根的番茄植株，培育出含有尼古丁的番茄植株。该植株的果实现在直径为 1.7 英寸，将测试尼古丁含量。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#simpson-fan-grows-tomacco-2003" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36824856" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;为 Drake 方程提供概率解的贝叶斯方法 (2019)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article /abs/pii/S0094576518314000</id>; <更新>;2023-07-22T10:59:53.941314Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/abs/pii/S0094576518314000"/>; <作者>; <name>;benbreen</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=benbreen</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://sdfestaticassets-us-east-1.sciencedirectassets.com/prod/2ef4d8152fbc3567339405003bdb413af1b1f441/image/elsevier-non-solus.png" style="width: 220px; height: 243px;" />;<br />;2015年，新地平线号探测器最接近冥王星及其卫星卡戎，为我们提供了一个评估宇宙中是否孤独的问题的机会。很多人都提出了这个问题的答案，但迄今为止对外星生命的搜寻尚未成功。贝叶斯方法可用于为德雷克方程提供概率解，该方程估计银河系中文明的数量。<a href="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/#bayesian-methods-to-provide-probablistic-solution-for-the-drake-equation-2019" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36803767" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
